title: Nice One Bedroom Apartment For Rent!
posting_body: Nice One Bedroom Apartment For Rent!
The Building is located at 1520 W. Carson Street in the City of Torrance…
This Building has a nice Landscape area in the Courtyard, a Swimming Pool and Laundry Room Facilities
The One Bedroom Unit is equipped with a Kitchen Refrigerator and Stove…
The Monthly Rent is only $1695.00 and you get a Parking Space in the Gated Carport Structure.
if interested for viewing times and more info.
